create table UserExt (
id int not null,
mobile varchar(11),
gender tinyint(1),
preferGender tinyint(1),
job varchar(50),
birthday datetime,
signtext varchar(400),
tag varchar(200),
PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

create table User (
id int not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
name varchar(20),
email varchar(80) not null,
password varchar(32) not null,
PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
